scripts.build-docs: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build-demo: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean && parcel build src/lib/floorplan/floorplan-exports.ts --out-file floorplan
scripts.build-test: npm run clean && parcel build src/lib/floorplan/floorplan-exports.ts --out-file floorplan --no-minify
